## Checklist

**Code Quality:**

- [ ] My code follows the existing code style of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new console warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements used for debugging

**Documentation:**

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for functions
- [ ] I have updated PERMISSIONS.md (if permissions changed)

**Functionality:**

- [ ] My changes do not break existing functionality
- [ ] I have tested the extension in both running and paused states
- [ ] I have tested that settings persist after browser restart
- [ ] I have verified memory cleanup (no memory leaks)
- [ ] All timer controls work correctly (start, pause, resume, stop)

**Compatibility:**

- [ ] My changes work on Chrome (latest version)
- [ ] My changes work on Edge (if possible to test)
- [ ] My changes work on all supported YouTube pages
- [ ] My changes maintain backward compatibility with existing user settings

**Internationalization (if applicable):**

- [ ] I have updated all 6 language files (_locales/*/messages.json)
- [ ] I have verified text fits in the UI for all languages
- [ ] I have not hardcoded any user-facing strings

**Privacy & Security:**

- [ ] My changes do not collect any user data
- [ ] My changes do not make external network requests
- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not added new permissions without justification
